definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: Others only looked at the soap or sniffed it.
sentences.chinese: 其他人只能看着肥皂泡或聞着肥皂味。

sentences.english: I wonder how much it would take to buy a soap-bubble if there was only one in the world?
sentences.chinese: 我想，假如世上只有一個肥皂泡，其價值會是多少呢？

sentences.english: The Su Causeway is refracted in soap bubbles made by Huahua.
sentences.chinese: 華華的肥皂泡折射出蘇堤的影子。

sentences.english: Can lathery pleasant to see reduce vision?
sentences.chinese: 肥皂泡入眼會降低視力嗎？

sentences.english: Apply to wet skin, work into a rich lather and rinse clean.
sentences.chinese: 塗在溼的皮膚上，產生豐富的肥皂泡，然後沖洗清潔。

sentences.english: This uncertainty about the path of policy has had the markets in a bit of a lather .
sentences.chinese: 政策軌跡的不確定性使市場像在肥皂泡中。

sentences.english: The close-ups show a different side to bubbles, with the surface textures
sentences.chinese: 這些特寫表現了肥皂泡不同的一面，包涵表面的結構。

sentences.english: Children enjoy spitting out iridescent soap pockets from pipes.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們喜歡從管中吹出有彩虹色的肥皂泡泡。

sentences.english: Under his bubble canopy, the Colonel scans the gloom of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 在肥皂泡一樣的駕駛艙罩裏，上校掃描着陰暗的森林。

sentences.english: Defining it is as unrewarding as dissecting a soapbubble.
sentences.chinese: 描述定義它和解剖肥皂泡泡一樣喫力不討好。

sentences.english: When they burst they go pop, but you can hardly hear it.
sentences.chinese: 肥皂泡破的時候會發出爆破聲，但你幾乎聽不見。

sentences.english: The soap lather suspends both the dirt and germs trapped inside and are then quickly washed away.
sentences.chinese: 肥皂泡將污物和細菌都陷在裏面，然後迅速將其沖走。

sentences.english: Where the walls of the bubble are at their thickest , the bubble will look blue-green.
sentences.chinese: 當肥皂泡泡膜達到最厚時，泡泡會呈現藍綠色。

sentences.english: Yang has performed with soap bubbles to audiences around the globe over the past two decades.
sentences.chinese: 楊凡向全球觀衆展現肥皂泡藝術已有20載。

definition: to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
